ActCanadian Race Relations Foundation Act
PrecisReappointment of ALBERT LO of Richmond, British Columbia, as Chairperson of the Canadian Race Relations Foundation to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, on a part-time basis, effective October 12, 2011
